amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the definition of "significant regulatory action" would include new Treasury regulations regarding non-resident alien deposits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to make it clear that the definition of significant regulatory action would include new Treasury regulations regarding non-resident alien deposits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 165 (Roll no. 534).
